page.title: 10LIVERPOOL FREEPORT.
page.content: In{November 1984 Princess Anne opened{Liverpool Freeport.}The {Freeport}lies in our block and includes the following docks:{Royal {Seaforth,Gladstone, Hornby, Alexandra, {and Langton.}It covers an area of{650 {acres}and it means that ships using these docks do not have to pay customs duties or taxes. Facilities in the {freeport}area are factories, modern machinery and large warehouses which can be used for storing goods. There are large areas of derelict land near the{docks}which could be used for buildings. As the{docks}have so many facilities they can handle many different imports. One of the things that will help the port to develop is that{Bootle}is close to the{M57, M62 and{M6}motorways which make it possible for lorries to reach all parts of{Britain. (James Evans)
